resources.string: The first unoffical offline capable\nGoogle Reader client for Android
Default text size in the browser

Tip:

You can enter / leave the full screen mode by tapping twice in the content area (the article body).

NewsRob would like to anonymously collect your usage data using flurry.com. This data will help the developer understand how you use NewsRob so that he can improve it.
 
This data collection is strictly opt-in, so if you do not approve no data will be collected. The application will continue to function normally regardless of this setting.
 
Currently, only general data will be collected: what device you use, your NewsRob and Android versions, which country you are in, which NewsRob screens you use and how long you use each screen.
 
In the future, more specific data may be collected, such as which menu options you use most frequently, NewsRob configuration information, etc. Before this happens however, this dialog will appear again and ask you again to allow this data to be gathered.
 
At any time you may open the settings and enable or disable the data collection.
 
Tip:
 
It is recommended to enable the usage data collection.
If you use NewsRob in any unusual way, or use a rare device or Android version, this is your opportunity to make the developer aware of it so that he can better support you.

NewsRob kept compatibility with old Android versions for quite some time and to some extent will continue to do so.
 
However this comes at a cost and as meanwhile there are only a few users left who use NewsRob on Android 1.5 - 2.0.1 devices, this cost became harder and harder to justify over the last releases.
 
To pick up speed with development the support for the older Android versions will be dropped from the main version of NewsRob.
 
However to make sure that you are still able to install NewsRob and get an update when I discover a very critical bug, a new version of NewsRob is on the Android Market for devices running older versions of the Android OS.
 
Please install the new version using the button below.
 
You then need to uninstall the current version of NewsRob.
 
If you have the Pro version of NewsRob this will also be recognized by the new version.
 
Also your per-feed settings will be picked up by the new version, but you need to login again and configure the basic parameters.
 
Thanks! â€“ Waiting for you on the other side.
No articles yet.\n\nSync to load content.

Login to NewsBlur needed 

 NewsRob will connect to the NewsBlur online service. Therefore your username and password is needed.

 You can decide if your password should be stored on this device. Otherwise you will be asked again for your credentials every sync.

 If you haven't used NewsBlur before, please visit:
 http://www.newsblur.com

string.name: enter_email_password_captcha
string.b: Login to NewsBlur with CAPTCHA needed

resources.string:
Login to NewsBlur needed 

 Your session expired and you need to login again!

 You can decide if your password should be stored on this device. Otherwise you will be asked again for your credentials every two weeks.
Not only for login, but for all communications with the NewsBlur server. Not for the websites though.
How often should NewsRob sync with NewsBlur and download content?
This default can be overwritten on a per feed basis.
Show a notification while a sync is running.
What to synchronize and keep locally.
When navigating with vol up/down, vibrate when there are no more articles
Select the color scheme of NewsRob.
Default Sort Order in Article List: Newest on the top?
Show Zoom Controls in the embedded browser.
Show hovering buttons to flip through the articles.
Flip through the articles using the volume controls.
Camera Button toggles an article between read and unread.
Swipe L-T-R to mark article read, R-T-L to mark unread.
Swipe L-T-R to mark article read, R-T-L to mark unread.
Additional starred articles to be synced and kept locally.
Additional notes to be synced and kept locally.
Additional shared articles to be synced and kept locally.
Notifications need to be enabled per feed also.
Flash LED to notify of new articles.
Pick a sound to notify of new articles.
Vibrate phone to notify of new articles.
Ask when >= x articles would be marked as read.

Sorry!

There was not enough memory to complete the operation.

You already closed the app (force closed), now press OK and NewsRob will be restarted. Please try again then what you just did.
It should work now.

Sorry for the inconvenience.

If this should happen on a regular basis and you can reproduce it, I would like to hear about it: travis@tabbal.net.

You selected to store articles and images on an SD card.

 Currently there is no accessible SD card available.

 Possible reasons:

 - No SD card inserted
 - SD card used as USB mass storage
 - SD card is almost full
 - SD card is read-only

 Impact:
 Until the SD card is accessible again NewsRob cannot synchronize or display downloaded articles.

 Resolution:
 Make the SD card accessible to continue using NewsRob or set Storage Provider to Phone Memory in the settings.
Number of articles that are to be synced and kept locally.
Download article content including images for offline use.
The storage provider for the downloaded content.
NewsBlur has sent a response that NewsRob cannot parse (yet).
Next synchronization\n starts in three minutes.
A new version of NewsRob is available!
There has been a problem while logging you in.\n\n
